column4: hey. when i was using windows, i was learning vb .net with visual studio and i was wondering if there is a different language that can be used in linux and i can use a gui like visual studio or is it all interpreter languages and stuff?
I recommend eclipse or idea and java
IDEA, specifically. A reasonably sophisticated java IDE. I don't use it or really like it myself, but old java hands seem to love it, and it just turned free-in-beer.
